content: 1/5 traffic cone amigurumi this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2022 for personal use only do not copy sell alter or distribute this pattern or parts of it you may sell a limited number of your handmade finished items provided you credit icrochetthings as the designer copyright © 2022 icrochetthings 2/5 materials key dk weight yarn in orange chain = chain white single_crochet = single_crochet c 2 75 mm crochet hook increase = increase stuffing decrease = decrease scissors slip_stitch = slip_stitch yarn needle blo = back loop only fp = front post f/o = finish off x = repeat x = total number of stitches information contact size tall ravelry icrochetthings 3 etsy icrochetthings tumblr i-crochet-things copyright © 2022 icrochetthings 3/5 cone base - begin with orange - increase = work 3 single_crochet in the same stitch - decrease = decrease over the next 3 stitches - at the end of each round slip_stitch into the first stitch of the round then chain 1 do not crochet in these stitches and they are not included in the final count 1 work 8 single_crochet in a magic_ring 8 2 single_crochet increase around 16 3 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 24 4 3 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 32 5 4 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet around 40 6 5 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet around 48 7 6 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet around 56 8 7 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet around 64 9 8 single_crochet increase 7 single_crochet around 72 10 fp single_crochet around 72 - f/o weave in loose ends copyright © 2022 icrochetthings 4/5 cone top - begin with orange - increase = work 2 single_crochet in the same stitch - decrease = decrease over the next 2 stitches 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase three times stop 9 15 total 4 blo single_crochet around 15 5 single_crochet around 15 6 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 18 7 single_crochet around 18 8 5 single_crochet increase around 21 9 single_crochet around 21 10 3 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet around 24 - break off orange and attach white 11 blo slip_stitch around 24 12 blo single_crochet around 24 13 7 single_crochet increase around 27 14 single_crochet around 27 15 4 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet around 30 16 single_crochet around 30 17 9 single_crochet increase around 33 - break off white and attach orange 18 blo slip_stitch around 33 19 blo single_crochet around 33 20 5 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet around 36 21 single_crochet around 36 22 11 single_crochet increase around 39 23 single_crochet around 39 24 6 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet around 42 25 single_crochet around 42 26 fp single_crochet around 42 27 single_crochet around 42 -
